answers.answer: It is normal to swell happened to me around 5 months last time. Ankles starting to swell now at 13 weeks. Late in pregnancy sudden swelling accompanied by changes in blood pressure can be signs of preeclampsia but don't worry about that yet. Do mention it at your next appt. Drink enough water and invest in some mild to moderate compression stockings from the pharmacy.

question: I'm 13 weeks pregnant and I noticed the other day my feet were already starting to swell. Today after work I noticed not only were both feet and ankles swollen but that my right leg was swollen way more and it continued about haft way up my calf. Is this normal this early?  This is my first pregnancy so it a bit paranoid.
title: swelling
